basics.name: Andi Empett
basics.label: DevOps Platforms Cloud
basics.summary: A problem solver. Constantly pushing platforms forward. I fully embrace DevOps culture and Agile methodologies. I ❤️ change and carve out patterns with disruptive new tech. Enabling engineering teams to deliver. An OSS contributor and evangelist.

work.name: JISC
work.description: Leading An interdisciplinary team of software developers, QAs, infrastructure engineers and data engineers.
work.summary: Building and operating software products that provide services to the education sector globally. Leading a team of engineers to grow software products while ensuring they are secure, meeting and improving on the software development standards set by the business and have the right infrastructure to perform reliably and at scale. Working with stakeholders to tap into our product data for business intelligence and creating new streams of value for customers.
highlights: Brought together scrum teams to deliver both new projects and enable existing software products to grow successfully. Increasing the team's data engineering capability and establishing new data engineering patterns.

Lead to create a new infrastructure as code pattern for the team with terraform and leaning into continuous delivery using GitLab. Leading to re-architect the dictorates cloud estate to be more cost effective and secure.
Mentoring staff and helping to move their career in new trajectories and grow their skills.
Taking the lead to support technical decision making and working with stakeholders, often from non-software or technical backgrounds to ensure the right technical direction is taken.
Bridging teams from across the wider business helping to craft new, efficient team topologies. Scoping technical work and bringing together the right people to implement change.
Performed technology reviews with multiple teams across the business. Working to invest in code, infrastructure, observability, documentation and team culture

work.name: capsulecrm.com
work.description: Leading Infrastructure Engineering, Observability and Site Reliability for a Growing Marketing platform.
work.summary: Evolving the platform from a startup to service that is needing to be both safe, can scale quickly and has a great developer experience Using devops best practice. Build and modernism the Ops team as it grew. Shift deployment of applications into containerised workloads. Leading the whole organisation to adopt common patterns in declarative infrastructure as code for application workloads. Shifting the business to adopt a multi cloud multi environment approach as they grew. Innovating in the DevOps space, bringing together infrastructure, automation, CICD, observability into something that was owned and being constantly developed.
highlights: Moved the company to multi cloud using common patterns
AWS multi account using Terraform and full CICD
Lead a new team integration with infrastructure, modern testing patterns and even building bonds between existing teams.
Developed the infrastructure, security, observability and CICD of a growing marketing platform to continuous improvement and ownership.
Re-developed the mail server capability to scale and be defined in code with containerisation.
Switched microservices to use Serverless containers with a common pattern.
Re-platformed microservices to use ARM architecture leveraging containerisation and AWS graviton. Gained performance and saved money.
Improved the scaling capability and backup of an in-house certificate generation Application

work.name: moneysupermarket.com
work.description: A Financial Services Company. Saving people money. Insurance products.
work.summary: Working across multiple groups in technology to support applications moving to a Kubernetes platform leading on a new GitOps pattern. Building complex CI/CD with Jenkins and GitHub actions to speed up delivery. Building applications with AWS lambda to facilitate data transformations and authentication between systems. Successfully delivered a re-platform of an insurance price comparison site in Java to be fully serverless in AWS using Typescript and CDK.
highlights: Delivering new green-field applications at scale.
Re-platforming Home Insurance Delivering the applications serverless.
Introducing Git-Ops Deployment patterns to the company with kubernetes and Argo-cd.
Giving regular showcases on the latest platform engineering innovation.
Improving the Developer experience and restructuring to a platform engineering team.

work.name: The University of Manchester
work.description: Innovation with new Global Open source Education Software.
work.summary: Working in a small team utilizing agile methodologies to make one of the worlds largest lecture recording systems written in java. I lead the deployment, maintenance, new features and improvements to a multi stream python-based capture software platform. Im also head up a node-based clinical skills dashboard built in AWS ECS.
highlights: Lead a team responsible for the deployment and stability of a product.
Growing the scale of infrastructure rapidly to meet service demand.
Automaton of video capture across one of the UK's largest enrolled student populations with high availability.
Collaborating with a global open source community.
Innovating new cloud-based services for academic technologies.

work.name: The University of Manchester
work.summary: Working in a demanding higher Education Research environment providing specialist support to a wide range of researchers and disciplines Supporting web based and scientific software and scripts. Requirements gathering and customising or repurposing software for research use

work.name: The University of Manchester
work.summary: Providing Laboratory support services to an interdisciplinary Research building
QA tester, Gas tester, analytical chemist and lab technician. Worked on supporting the initial roll out of a next generation safety product.

volunteer.summary: Mentoring people early in their coding career wanting to adopt DevOps culture.
Working as a adviser for young people looking to start a career in code. Providing mentoring and mock interviews.
Mentoring University students from all academic pursuits with varying coding skills. Worked one-on-one and in small teams teaching javascript and python.

publications.name: An Adopter Centric API and Visual Programming Interface for the Definition of Strategies for Automated Camera Tracking.
publications.summary: A UX focused javascript api for camera tracking technologies built for javascript.

Simple defined permissions model
Codifies org patterns with naming and tagging
Modern authentication
projects.description: SSM + hush. Making AWS secrets storing prescriptive and simple

projects.name: Packer Digitalocean image lifecycle
highlights: Built using the packer plugin framework
Augmented additional open source plugins lacking image delete support
projects.description: Manage Digitalocean image cleanup over time. Compliments the digitalocean packer plugins.

projects.name: Galicaster
highlights: Added stability and fixes as the product grew
Gave talks on features and workshops for new adopters
Failover microphone automation's
QR code interaction with the video stream state
Developing live streaming with RTMP and NDI

projects.name: Peakaboo
highlights: lead a major Refactor to Bring a community release
Added An authentication provider
Added features for real time streaming of video and remote camera control
projects.description: A dashboard used for large scale machine monitoring

projects.name: terraform-provider-mongodb
highlights: Improved usability with different flavours of mongodb like documentdb.
Supported changes to handling encryption.
